Class CompanyRepView

java.lang.Object
boundaries.CompanyRepView
public class CompanyRepView extends Object
Boundary (UI) class for Company Representatives.

This class handles all user interactions for company representatives:

  • Create internship opportunities
  • Edit pending opportunities
  • View and toggle visibility of existing opportunities
  • Filter all opportunities
  • View applications for their internships
  • Approve applicants
  • Change password
  • Logout
It acts as the presentation layer between user input and the CompanyRepController business logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepView

      public CompanyRepView(CompanyRepController companyRepController)
      Constructs a new CompanyRepView.
      Parameters:
      companyRepController - controller for performing company representative operations

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(AppContext Context, Scanner sc)
      Main menu loop for company representatives.

      Displays options and calls the respective methods until the user logs out.

      Parameters:
      sc - scanner for reading user input
      context - application context containing the active session

    • createInternshipOpportunity

      public void createInternshipOpportunity(Scanner sc, CompanyRepController companyRepController, AppContext context)
      Creates a new internship opportunity.

      Prompts the company representative for:

      • Title
      • Description
      • Internship level
      • Preferred major
      • Opening and closing dates
      • Department
      • Number of slots
      Performs full validation on dates and slot counts.
      Parameters:
      sc - scanner for user input
      companyRepController - controller for opportunity creation
      context - current app context

    • toggleOpps

      public void toggleOpps(CompanyRepController companyRepController, AppContext context, Scanner sc)
      Toggles visibility of a company's internship opportunities.

      Allows company representative to turn visibility ON/OFF for any opportunity.

      Parameters:
      companyRepController - controller performing updates
      context - application context
      sc - scanner for reading input

    • editPendingInternshipOpportunities

      public void editPendingInternshipOpportunities(CompanyRepController companyRepController, AppContext context, Scanner sc)
      Allows company representative to edit details of internship opportunities that are still pending approval.

      Editable fields include:

      • Title
      • Description
      • Opening date
      • Closing date
      • Preferred major
      • Slots
      • Department
      • Internship level
      Parameters:
      companyRepController - controller performing updates
      context - application context
      sc - scanner for reading input

    • viewRelevantInternshipOpportunities

      public void viewRelevantInternshipOpportunities(CompanyRepController companyRepController, AppContext context, Scanner sc)
      Displays a company representative’s pending, filled, and approved internship opportunities.

      Additionally allows them to:

      • View applicants
      • Approve applicants
      Parameters:
      companyRepController - controller accessing opportunities and applicants
      context - current application context
      sc - scanner for reading input

    • viewAllInternshipOpportunities

      public void viewAllInternshipOpportunities(CompanyRepController companyRepController)
      Lists all internship opportunities in the system.
      Parameters:
      companyRepController - controller retrieving opportunity list

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(AppContext context, Scanner sc, CompanyRepController controller)
      Allows the logged-in company representative to change their password.

      Validates the old password before updating to a new one and saves the change to persistent storage.

      Parameters:
      context - application context containing the logged-in user
      sc - scanner for user input
      controller - controller responsible for saving user data

    • filterOpportunities

      public void filterOpportunities(Scanner sc, CompanyRepController companyRepController, AppContext context)
      Allows company representatives to filter all internship opportunities in the system.

      Filterable fields:

      • Internship level
      • Preferred major
      • Status
      • Opening date (earliest)
      • Closing date (latest)

      This method:

      1. Prompts for filter criteria
      2. Validates all user input
      3. Saves the filter to session
      4. Displays filtered results
      5. Allows recursive editing of filters
      Parameters:
      sc - scanner for user input
      companyRepController - controller providing filtered results
      context - application context storing the filter
